heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers likely north, chance in the south; a trace to an inch. Highs in the low to mid teens north, mid teens to around 20 south. West to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clouds decreasing south, decreasing gradually north. Scattered snow showers diminishing, except remaining in the northern Green Mountains; another trace to an inch, mainly over high terrain. Lows 5 above to 5 below zero, cold hollows around 10 below. Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast and in the Adirondacks. Highs in the low to mid teens north, mid teens to around 20 south. West winds 5 to 10 mph.
